mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member VALUES (#{memberId}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{memberName}, '${AES_KEY}'), #{memberCompanyName}, #{memberPassword}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{memberTel}, '${AES_KEY}'), #{memberCompanyTel}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{memberAddress}, '${AES_KEY}'), AES_ENCRYPT(#{memberDetailAddress}, '${AES_KEY}'), AES_ENCRYPT(#{memberDeliveryAddress}, '${AES_KEY}'), AES_ENCRYPT(#{memberDetailDeliveryAddress}, '${AES_KEY}'), AES_ENCRYPT(#{memberEmail}, '${AES_KEY}'), #{memberFile}, 0000, 0, NOW(), 0, null)
mapper.select: set @rownum := 0
select count(*) from member where NOT member_id = "admin"

select member_id, member_company_name, member_company_tel, member_file, member_fran_code, member_tier, member_date, member_disable, member_disable_date, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_name, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_tel, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_email, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)) from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_tier ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select member_id, member_company_name, member_company_tel, member_file, member_fran_code, member_tier, member_date, member_disable, member_disable_date, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_name, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_tel, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_email, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)) from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin") b;

select member_id, member_company_name, member_company_tel, member_file, member_fran_code, member_tier, member_date, member_disable, member_disable_date, member_password, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_name, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_tel, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_email, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)) from member where member_id = #{memberId}
select member_id from member where member_name = #{memberName} and member_email = #{memberEmail}
select member_password from member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_email = #{memberEmail}

select member_id, member_company_name, member_company_tel, member_file, member_fran_code, member_tier, member_date, member_disable, member_disable_date, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_name, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_tel, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_email, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)) from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_company_name ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select member_id, member_company_name, member_company_tel, member_file, member_fran_code, member_tier, member_date, member_disable, member_disable_date, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_name, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_tel, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_email, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)) from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_company_name desc ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select member_id, member_company_name, member_company_tel, member_file, member_fran_code, member_tier, member_date, member_disable, member_disable_date, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_name, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_tel, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_email, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)) from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" order by member_fran_code ) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select member_id, member_company_name, member_company_tel, member_file, member_fran_code, member_tier, member_date, member_disable, member_disable_date, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_name, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_tel, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_email, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)) from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_company_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select member_id, member_company_name, member_company_tel, member_file, member_fran_code, member_tier, member_date, member_disable, member_disable_date, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_name, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_tel, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_email, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)) from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select member_id, member_company_name, member_company_tel, member_file, member_fran_code, member_tier, member_date, member_disable, member_disable_date, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_name, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_tel, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_email, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)) from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_company_tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select member_id, member_company_name, member_company_tel, member_file, member_fran_code, member_tier, member_date, member_disable, member_disable_date, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_name, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_tel, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_email, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)) from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_tier LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};

select member_id, member_company_name, member_company_tel, member_file, member_fran_code, member_tier, member_date, member_disable, member_disable_date, CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_name, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_tel, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_detail_delivery_address, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)), CAST(AES_DECRYPT(member_email, '${AES_KEY}') AS CHAR(100)) from ( select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum, a.* from member a, (select @rownum := 0) tmp where NOT member_id = "admin" and member_disable LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) b where b.rownum between #{start} and #{end};
mapper.update: update member set member_password = #{memberTempPassword} where member_id = #{memberId}
update member set member_tier = #{memberTier} where member_id = #{memberId}
update member set member_disable = #{memberDisable}, member_disable_date = NOW() where member_id = #{memberId}
